column5: IDRA is good if u can hold it for 10 years This stock might hit 6070 bucks but it is a long hold I know this company will have a good future but u have to hold 10 yrs

IDRA The interesting part is company announced before that 100 sites but at present they have 104 sites as per ASCO presentation Why more sites are coming forward to participate on this trial Good medicine always finds in more peoples cabinet
IDRA Finally MD Anderson Cancer Center Houston Texas becomes the part of Ph3 site and that brings total no of sites to 94
